hero.title: Projects that make sense
hero.subtitle: Our achievements
hero.description: Explore a selection of achievements carried out with our clients: design, self-build, and renewable energies.

projects.title: Passive house in Beauvechain
projects.description: Complete renovation of a 1970s family home into a passive house. External insulation, triple glazing, double flow VMC and 8kW photovoltaic installation.

testimonial.text: Oveco supported us in this transformation. Today, our energy bill is divided by 10!
testimonial.author: Marie Martin

projects.title: Ecological self-built extension
projects.description: Support for self-building a 40m² extension in wooden frame and straw insulation. Practical training and technical follow-up throughout the project.

testimonial.text: Thanks to Oveco's support, we were able to build our extension ourselves while learning sustainable techniques.
testimonial.author: Pierre Dubois

projects.title: Renovation with solar heating
projects.description: Complete energy renovation with installation of a combined solar heating system. Attic insulation, window replacement and solar water heater installation.

testimonial.text: The solar heating system allows us to drastically reduce our gas consumption. An investment that pays for itself quickly.
testimonial.author: Sophie Leroy

projects.title: Self-built straw house
projects.description: Complete support for building a 100m² straw house. Training in straw construction techniques, wooden frame and earth plasters.

testimonial.text: Building our straw house was a dream. Oveco gave us the keys to achieve it with environmentally friendly techniques.
testimonial.author: Thomas Rousseau
